title: Technology-Enhanced Outdoor Mathematics Exploration: Learning Design in Local Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (algebra, geometry, statistics) and fundamental smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: Field research and data analysis-centered learning using smartphone apps in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can convert data collected from local natural environments into mathematical models
Learners can perform real-time calculations and visualization processes in field settings using mobile apps
Learners can document and present mathematical problem-solving processes through project-based collaboration

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Data Collection App (AR Measurement Tool, GPS Coordinate Tracker)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
